title: Run pre-flight checks
description:
Verify the codebase is in a healthy state before starting implementation.

Commands to run:
- go build ./...
- go test ./internal/worktree/...

Document any pre-existing failures.
acceptance_criteria: go build ./... succeeds; go test ./internal/worktree/... passes
closed_reason: Pre-flight checks passed: go build ./... succeeded with no errors, go test ./internal/worktree/... passed (cached). No pre-existing failures found. Codebase is healthy for implementation.
